results.title: [Inhibitory Effect of Simvastatin Combined with Doxorubicin on Biological Functions of Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma Cells and Its Mechanism].
results.journal: Zhongguo Shi Yan Xue Ye Xue Za Zhi
results.text_hl: [Inhibitory Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Combined with @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Doxorubicin@@@ on Biological Functions of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Large_B_Cell_Diffuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016403 @@@Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma@@@ Cells and Its Mechanism].

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Zhang MA, Zhou H, Xue QF, Shi WY, Zhang YP. [Inhibitory Effect of Simvastatin Combined with Doxorubicin on Biological Functions of Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma Cells and Its Mechanism]. Zhongguo Shi Yan Xue Ye Xue Za Zhi. 2025 Feb;33(1):82-92. PMID: 40017190

results.title: Inhibition of geranylgeranylation mediates sensitivity to CHOP-induced cell death of DLBCL cell lines.
results.text_hl: Using a cell line-based model for @GENE_DDIT3 @GENE_1649 @@@CHOP@@@ resistant @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Large_B_Cell_Diffuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016403 @@@DLBCL@@@, we show that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which inhibits protein farnesylation and geranylgeranylation, sensitizes @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_Large_B_Cell_Diffuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016403 @@@DLBCL@@@ cells to cytotoxic treatment.

citations.NLM: Ageberg M, Rydström K, Lindén O, Linderoth J, Jerkeman M, Drott K. Inhibition of geranylgeranylation mediates sensitivity to CHOP-induced cell death of DLBCL cell lines. Exp Cell Res. 2011 May 1;317(8):1179-91. PMID: 21324313
citations.BibTeX: @article{21324313, title={Inhibition of geranylgeranylation mediates sensitivity to CHOP-induced cell death of DLBCL cell lines.}, author={Ageberg M and Rydström K and Lindén O and Linderoth J and Jerkeman M and Drott K}, journal={Exp Cell Res}, volume={317}, number={8}, pages={1179-91}}
